definition: plain and without any extras or adornments, a distinctive fragrant flavor characteristic of vanilla beans
details:
adjective
- plain and without any extras or adornments
= example: plain and without any extras or adornments
- flavored with vanilla extract
= example: flavored with vanilla extract
noun
- a distinctive fragrant flavor characteristic of vanilla beans
- a flavoring prepared from vanilla beans macerated in alcohol (or imitating vanilla beans)
- any of numerous climbing plants of the genus Vanilla having fleshy leaves and clusters of large waxy highly fragrant white or green or topaz flowers
